title: 318. Q&AF: Developing People Of Character, Retaining Employees & Purpose: Innate Or Developed?
itunes:title: 318. Q&AF: Developing People Of Character, Retaining Employees & Purpose: Innate Or Developed?
description: In today’s episode, Andy answers your questions on what’s the best way to hire trustworthy & hard working employees, how to retain those employees for the long term and whether your purpose in life is innate or it’s something that you eventually develop.
content:encoded: In today’s episode, Andy answers your questions on what’s the best way to hire trustworthy & hard working employees, how to retain those employees for the long term and whether your purpose in life is innate or it’s something that you eventually develop.
